resumeOptimizer:
Description
This is a hands-on technical role, day to day activities include:
Delivering working web-based software
Giving advice on technology adoption and selection as it pertains to web solutions. It’s not a project management role although mentoring is encouraged.
Influence and guide the direction of the web-based solutions and ramp up the rest of the team’s web knowledge
What We Can Expect from You
3+ years recent commercial programming with a strong emphasis towards delivering Web solutions
Expert understanding of a wide variety of web technologies, how to design and build websites and web based applications
Significant experience using React (or another major framework like Vue)
Nice to Haves
These aren’t required, but be sure to mention them in your application if you have them.
Experience with TypeScript, ReScript, Go, Node.js, Elixir, or any functional programming language (e.g. OCaml, Haskell, Erlang)
An understanding of server side rendering (e.g. using Next.js with React)
Experience with AWS
Experience working with video streams (RTSP, HLS) and video files
Experience working with HR-related applications
Experience with ReasonML
Experience working with UX Designers & exposure to tools such as Figma, Framer, etc
Japanese language proficiency
skillDescription: Also proficient in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, grew up bilingual (English and Klingon).
